author: lathomas
body:
Backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/25380 for 9_4_X. 
N.B. This code makes use of external files in 
https://github.com/cms-data/PhysicsTools-PatUtils
which may imply a backport of the following PR as well (?)
https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/4595
title: L1 Prefiring weight extractor (backport to 9_4_X)
